stories.title: Don't fight the browser preload scanner

stories.text:
Hello HN,

I would like to build a website that sells costumized google pixel phones with enhanced security features.

My goal would be to have a nice a simple ui that displays the device with verbose selectable options and that bring you to the payment process.

I'm not a web developer so I was looking for a framework that would achieve that with modern look.

I'm also looking for co-founders. Risso.gabriele@protonmail.ch

Thank you
stories.title: Ask HN: One-product ecommerce website build
Is Product Hunt still a good place to launch a startup?

stories.text:
I thought the value of UST is that you can exchange it for LUNA. But since LUNA is down from $80 to $0.0002, why is UST still traded at 20% of its old value?

Who is buying it and what is their incentive?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is UST still traded at about 20 cent per UST?
